text: Pharaoh's Island is an island on the River Thames, in Surrey, England. == Location == The island is above Shepperton Lock. It can only be reached by boats. == History == The island was given to Admiral Nelson as a reward for winning Battle of the Nile, and he used it as a place to fish. == Other websites == * The River Thames Guide â€” Shepperton Lock Category:Islands of England Category:Geography of Surrey
title: Pharaoh's Island
